itunes:title: Episode 978 - Could You Run 100 Miles Straight?
title: Episode 978 - Could You Run 100 Miles Straight?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Veteran and distance runner Jason Wood joins the show to talk about how the hell anyone can run a hundred miles, what it’s like to relieve yourself in the middle of a multiple-day run, the love lives of Iraqis who own animals, and playing against Mike Vi...
itunes:summary:
Veteran and distance runner Jason Wood joins the show to talk about how the hell anyone can run a hundred miles, what it’s like to relieve yourself in the middle of a multiple-day run, the love lives of Iraqis who own animals, and playing against Mike Vick in high school football.
